News & Topics
\t\t

2015-8-31(Mon)

\t\t\t\t\t\t
\t\t

The following file was posted to the Application Guidelines and Forms page on Monday, August 31, 2015: “Instructions for Application for Exemption or Deferred Payment of the Enrollment Fee and Exemption, Deferred Payment or Payment by Installments of the Tuition Fee in the 2015-2016 Academic Year”.

Applicants are requested to read the instructions carefully in order to complete the application procedure. Strict observation of the deadline is required.

Note: Paper copies of above PDF are not available at Student Centers.

Contact

Tuition Fees Exemption Staff, Suita Student Center

(Tel: 06-6879-7088, 7089)
